@ImAGuest & Obsidianguard239 Oh fuck you. It's not one or the other. The world (and sex) is not black and white. Sexual fantasies are NOT reality. Doesn't mean they don't affect us and we shouldn't be mindful and self-aware and it doesn't mean rape culture isn't real. But with that ignorant thinking you might as well be bitching about Dan Savage and Betty Dodson.People are and always will be weird. You should be glad it's make believe for most and be fascinated by the weird things the human brain will do.
